From: Grace Chandler, To: Elijah. H. Chandler Mailed From: Kansas City, Missouri on May 1, 1911 Postcard Info: "Phostint" Card. Made only by Detroit Publishing Co. Trademark - Reg. U.S. Pat. Off. Picture Info: 12464 Union Station, Kansas City, Missouri

E.H. Chandler Pearl, Illinois

Dear Papa, We're in this old Union Station. Now 8:10 pm. Leave here 9:25 Got along fine so far Grace
